settings.abtone_2_des: From the calypso music of the carribeans The styles or genre of music that exists across  the world is mind boggling to say the least.  Starting from the Calypso styles of the Afro Caribbean to the Brazilian Zumba styles of dance music, the western classical styles, the Indian genres and the Sufi styles besides the Arabic offer amazing variety .
